Sadece çok sevdiğim oyunlara inceleme yazarım ve bu oyun cidden bambaşka ya. 2 yıl önce alıp ne de olsa puzzle türü sevmem dediğim için oynamadığım oyunu bi gazla indirip oynadım. Sonrasında neden oynamayıp aptallık etmişim diye kendime kızdım. Mükemmel bölüm tasarımları, harika mizahı ve oynanışıyla tam bir şaheser. Gerçi Valve'dan kötü bir oyun çıkmasını da bekleyemezdim. Alın oynayın ayrıca harika bir CO-OP modu da bulunmakta. EFSANE.

PS：一次的游戏时间最好不要超过2个小时，不要问我为什么[spoiler] 但是控制不住我自己啊！！！！吐[。。。。/spoiler]

One of the best puzzle games ever made! It has great gameplay mechanics as well as an interesting story, amusing dialog, and lots of unique and captivating environments. And not to mention everyone's favorite artificial intelligence GlaDOS! 

I highly recommend this game. Seriously, get it! You won't be disappointed.

Oh boy oh boy! I am going to be honest here, this game is downright fantastic! Then I first saw portal and Portal 2 I was like: hm, okay it's a game there a popular but not something for me, also, I am so horribly bad at puzzle, so this is not something for me.

But then steam seals came over and got my downloads totally slow, but in the steam seals, there was portal and portal 2 on SALE! I think it was 3€ for them both in total, so I just buy it just for seeing what portal REALLY is, and it turned out to be games that I could beat! And then there is me there are bad at puzzles!

I talked a lot of how I got these games in my hand, and it's not even portal I should talk about, so here comes what portal 2 is about and what you get

While I may use a lots of no time here on nothing becures the game is so old now, I still like to wirte this becures I really like it and also I am really bored right now! But portal 2 is a game there you... pretty much have a portal gun in your hand and make portals you can go through, but in the meantime you are in this really cool story about GLADOS And WHEALTY (i think) Cave Johnsen and aperture sience (spells wrong) While you are looking at awesome places and test chambers there you even think that was total baby esay or a chamber there you just need a YouTube video to help you. And not enough of that, there are steam-workshop there you can create your own levels or try infinite of chambers others have made, while you can collect steam-cards out of this portal game and get some badass things in it, and if you just want more story's of these characters and company, there is always portal story's and thinking with time machine and a game without portals: aperture tag and much more I think and hope!

There is only one thing you should do before you start playing this if you just buy it, that is change the video revolution, for it's really bad looking at start, but I think you figure out that for sure! 

So is this recommended? Well if you like puzzles, you may already have this game while you reading this for a reason I don't know, but if you don't like puzzles, you surely will then you buy this game! But wait on steam seals for it, it's more worth it, but it's your money, at I can't control them! So please, hope you enjoyed and got something out of this still then this is a old game, else I hope you have a good day!

MILES beyond the first portal, this game has a richer story, richer characters, character development, humor, dilectable voice acting, all new puzzle mechanics, and a mind blowing finale. This game will not in any way disappoint. The coop mode is also pretty awesome, as well as the level editor. I play the last chapter of this game, and every time i get a little more giddy. Its a masterpiece. glados and wheatley have drastic and moving character development. Plus the turrets sing an epic chorus at the end, and the glados song is orgasmic. Hell, the whole game is orgasmic.

Portal 1'den çok daha iyi bir kurgu ve testlerin olduğu, var olan mücadelelerdeki diyalogların bile özenle yazıldığını anlayacağınız ve eğleneceğiniz harika bir oyun. Gerçekten çok iyiydi. Zevkle oynadım ve tek oturuşta bitirdim. Tavsiye ederim.

Portal 2 is a great sequel to Portal with completely new things while retaining the same element. There is gel and core transfers twice, and more difficult puzzles. Your enemy is one you never imagned, and so is your ally. A new feature is co-op, where you can team up with a friend and special puzzles that specially require 2 people and 4 portals. Another feature, perhaps the most famous, is community test chambers. You can play other confuzzling test chambers, or, make a confuzzling one yourself! 
I highly recommend this game for puzzle-seekers, people looking for a fun game, and, of course, people who played the first Portal game. And you can customize your co-op robots, P-Body and Atlas. 
You can get a achievement item to put on them just by completing Portal 2. 
So, I very highly recommend it.

hace  tiempo hice un analisis sobre portal pero no la habia completado y me parecio un mal juego no a cambiado exajeradamente mi opinion pero esta vez le voy a poner un positivo y les dire poque que comienze el analisis y perdon por que soy una mierda con los signos de puntuasion .
la historia  comienza con nuesto personje desconocido en una avitacion la cual un robot viene y nos comienza a hablar y no comienza a mover por un centro de invesigaciones llamado apertur sayans (nose como se escribe asi que lo puse como me suena).
desde hay comienza nuestra aventura , el comienzo del juego me parece vastante monotono y ubiera preferido fuese mas directo pero  supongo es una forma de integrar a los nuevos jugadores y dar contexto basico . yo personalmente soy una mierda en los pudles y admito tener que usar guias para completar este juego en unas 8 o 9 pruebas a la mayoria se lke aran prubas medianamente retadoras pero las completaran sin mas pero si sos como yo uan mierda en la logia pruba este juego solo por la historia y juegalo junto a un amigo que se bueno en eso y asi no se sentira tan forzado como usar guias .
grafica mente esta bien para la epoca nada mas que resaltar .
ahora la mejor parte los persoanjes empezare por la famos glados es un personaje entre frio y carismatico con umor bastante presente es su charlas , esta bastante vien constridos y su avanze por la historia es muy formidable dandonos una pregunta que al fianl es respondida la cual es spoierls (que al llegar al final del juuego y remplazar a guidli el que ara cn nosotros nos deja salir de apretur y nos mada fuera junto con nuestro amigo el cubo de compania XD .
guidli es otra historia es un persdonaje 100 porciento unmor y al fianl malvolo y luego reflexibo y muchas cosos para mi lo mejor que tiene este juego mientras me hablaba atrabes de las camaras a costa de glados para desconectarla soltaba bromas y me intentaba alludar y luego al tener todo el poder se empieza a enloquecer y al final poniendonos  a hacer pruebas para su diversion pero le aburre y decide que quiere matarnos lo cual me resulto algo ovio desde que se hizo malo el combate fianl es de lo mas  sencillo sin guias te lo pasas en 3 o 2 intento  yo use guias porque estaba arto de jhugar portal 6 horas seguidas tu aslo asi nomas bueno despues de mandarlo al espacio antrabes de un portal en la luna y de la cancion fianl el da un mensaje de que esta arrepentido y que si pudiera arreglaria todo el paso por un caso de desesperacion en elk que se miente haci solo eseprando que algo lo salbe pero yo se que si todo comenzara de nuevo el hubiera echo lo mismo o eso creo y se me da a entender y igual que le jodan por egoista XD . bueno como mensaje les recomiendo que lo compren y lo juegen quisas 1.30 horas por dia puede ser agotador para algunas personas y asi lo disfrutaran mas por 2 o 3 dolares ahora en fiestas supongo una compra infalible y algo que ninguna cuenta de steam junto a half life deberia conseguir y si te gustan los pudles lo disfrutaras el doble puntaje subjetivo 8:10 opinion personal 
:reflexion: creo que si el jeugo no fuera de pudles yo personalmente me hubiera entretenido mucho mas pero nose como hubiera afectado a la historia pero creo que el equipo de valve de ese entonces hubiera echo una hobra de igual  calidad  de personajes nose quisas algo mas dedicado a el movimiento con la pistola a alta velozidad nada de cubos y cosas de ese estilo o que ya estubieran puestas nose algo haci ideas de un boludo chau desde uruguay

Questo é il mio videogioco preferito di sempre, Portal 2: il seguito di Portal. Questa storia narra il seguito delle avventure di Chell, la protagonista del primo gioco, dopo la sconfitta della malvagia robot GLaDOS, che si risveglierà ,dopo un piccolo viaggio attraverso i livelli del primo gioco, e che ci ri-userà come cavie da laboratorio, come nel primo. I test sono più difficili, a parer mio, rispetto a quelli del primo gioco, anche grazie a nuove meccaniche aggiunte: dai laser e i cubi che li riflettono, ai trampolini speciali che ti lanciano in aria, ai gel, gel che ti permetteranno di fare diverse cose: dal saltellare, al aumentare di velocità correndoci sopra, al sparare portali sopra di esso anche se la superficie sottostante non lo permetterebbe.
E poi hanno aggiunto la modalità cooperativa, dove si giocherà nei panni di Atlas (per il G1) e P-Body (per il G2), le nuove cavie robot di GLaDOS. Infine, come ciliegina sulla torta... Hanno aggiunto un editor di livelli! Puoi creare livelli e pubblicarli nel Workshop e scaricarne altri per giocare. Quindi, se lo possiamo dire, con Portal 2 abbiamo una giocabilità QUASI infinita!!!
Lo consiglio a tutti gli amanti del genere e per chi ha un amico con cui giocarci. In poche parole: consigliato!
Лови! Лови! Меня! Блядь!!!

I loved Portal 1 and enjoyed Portal 2.  If you haven't played either, I recommend starting with the first Portal.  It's not strictly necessary, but if you play Portal 2 first, you're going to want to play Portal 1 anyway, so you might as well get the most out of the series.  Portal 2 goes deeper into the history of the Portal story, which will be little more meaningful if you play Portal 1.  Portal 2 introduces new play mechanics that work well with the portal concept.  As a sequel, of course, it can't recreate your first awe and discovery of Portal, but it's a worthy sequel, great writing, good puzzles, a must play.

Do you like a puzzling game with a wonderfully hilarious storyline? Portal 2 is a truly fantastic follow up to Portal. This game has a rare ability to keep you coming back with in depth coop puzzles and tons of workshop puzzles available. Most puzzle games are a one and done, while Portal 2 strays from that stereotype. I definitely recommend Portal 2 for any serious PC gamer to add to their collection.
